answers.answer: I have a close friend on the patch she got sick for the first 3 to 4months on it if that helps at all.
I got pregnant while on the patch

My little sister got pregnant on the patch.  She got pregnant in July 2003 and didn't actually find out until late October.  SHe is now 6 months pregnant.  She too, thought she was vomiting due to the patch... guess she was wrong, huh?  Try a HPT just to be sure!  Good luck!LeAnne

I already did a hpt but it was neg., 2 times... It's crazy, I get get hungey for something wierd and it feels good, but can't see baby food, meat, etc. Sometimes, I feel lightly bubbly inside but its not gas, my ob thinks I'm probally wierd.  don't know what to think now. But Thanks for all suggustions and stories.

a month just went by and i did not get my period  it usally normal two pregancy test say not pregant what should i do?

question: I am new to this site... Hello everyone! I had diabetes during my first pregancy about 1 year 1/2  ago w/ my DD who has Down Syndrome. I got pregant while I was on the pill but recently I have switched to the patch. A week ago I started getting nausea and vomiting, I thought I was pregant. But it couldn't been possible only because I had a four day period when the nausea started! I took the test and it was neg. I had the patch on three other months and never felt these symtoms... Can I possibly be prg., and it not show on the test (CVS Brand) or can it just be that my boby is now reacting to this medication? Has anyone expericened this before or anyone you know?
title: Pregant or a symptom
